definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Mrs. Castle was invariably standing there on the porch waiting for her son.
sentences.chinese: 卡斯爾夫人總是站在門廊上等兒子。

sentences.english: Some kid left this on the front porch.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子把這些落在前面的門廊了。

sentences.english: The fallen tree has bridged the two porches.
sentences.chinese: 那棵倒下的樹木把兩個門廊連接起來了。

sentences.english: The first thing Nekhludoff saw, on entering, was a large, stinking tub.
sentences.chinese: 旅站門廊裏放着一個臭烘烘的大木桶，就是“便桶”。

sentences.english: A three-passenger swing hung from the ceiling of the broad front porch.
sentences.chinese: 寬闊的門廊上掛着一個可供三人玩的鞦韆。

sentences.english: The porch opens out onto the Kidron valley through three curved archways .
sentences.chinese: 門廊外側透過三個拱門向著克德隆溪谷。

sentences.english: The Italian couple in the doorway did not want to reveal their names.
sentences.chinese: 站在門廊的意大利夫婦不願透露姓名。

sentences.english: Hareton, drive those dozen sheep into the barn porch.
sentences.chinese: 海爾頓，把這些樣都趕到穀倉前的門廊去。

sentences.english: The little porch was hidden from view by a screen of yellow roses and Southern smilax.
sentences.chinese: 而那個小門廊則被滿眼的黃玫瑰和南方天冬草所遮蔽。

sentences.english: I suggest you take the front porch away.
sentences.chinese: 我建議你把前門廊拆掉。

sentences.english: There he lay, sprawled across the doorway.
sentences.chinese: 他四仰八叉地躺在那兒，堵住了門廊。

sentences.english: 1A woman walks up to a little old man rocking in a chair on his porch.
sentences.chinese: 1一位女士走向坐在門廊的椅子上搖動的小老頭。

sentences.english: A private boathouse serves as a portal onto a picturesque Adirondack lake.
sentences.chinese: 一幢私人船屋宛如迷人的阿迪朗達克湖上的門廊。

sentences.english: But I should do something for you. Look at this, ” and he held up an early autumn leaf that had fluttered onto the porch.
sentences.chinese: 你看，”他撿起了一片飄落在門廊上的早秋落葉。

sentences.english: Just then the old woman's cat wanders across the porch in front of them.
sentences.chinese: 這時老太太的貓穿過門廊遛達到他們面前。

sentences.english: A heavy rain sudden comes, so i have to take shelter at a porch.
sentences.chinese: 突然傾盆大雨，我只好在一個門廊處避一避。
